Posts.EditableText:
Hello, I have created a game for me and friends, it is working in preview. I have pressed the publish button and when i want to play it came an error. What am I doing wrong.

Thanks.
Posts.HTML:
Hello, I have created a game for me and friends, it is working in preview. I have pressed the publish button and when i want to play it came an error. What am I doing wrong.

Thanks.

Posts.EditableText: The error message should tell you what the problem is.
Posts.HTML: The error message should tell you what the problem is.

Posts.EditableText:
Sorry, something went wrong
An error occurred while processing your request.

This has been logged, but it would be really helpful if you could let us know a bit more information about what you were doing - please contact us and we'll do our best to fix things.
Posts.HTML:
Sorry, something went wrong
An error occurred while processing your request.

This has been logged, but it would be really helpful if you could let us know a bit more information about what you were doing - please contact us and we'll do our best to fix things.

Posts.EditableText:
Ah… likely some kind of server error, then. Trying again later might help.

Either that or you're on the insecure version of the site (`http://` in the address where it should be `https://`)
Posts.HTML:
Ah… likely some kind of server error, then. Trying again later might help.

Either that or you're on the insecure version of the site (http:// in the address where it should be https://)

Posts.EditableText:
yes, insecure version is problem. on mobile is working nice.
Thanks for the help.
Posts.HTML:
yes, insecure version is problem. on mobile is working nice.
Thanks for the help.
